title: Outras Fontes releases Maryam
content:
Outras Fontes releases Maryam, a script typeface designed by Ricardo Gomes.

[http://www.outrasfontes.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015145505/http:/www.outrasfontes.com/ "http://www.outrasfontes.com")

There are two fonts in the family: Maryam Regular and Maryam Alternate. Each font has more than 70 ligatures, providing a lot of letterform variations. Avaliable to buy at MyFonts. Take a look.

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015145505im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hellotypophille_6327.gif)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015145505/http:/www.outrasfontes.com/)
author: outrasfontes

comments.content:
Beautiful work! I purchased both fonts at My Fonts. Very nice.

Sharon

Thanks Sharon!

If you would like to receive information about font updates and other new releases from Outras Fontes, please subscribe to our newsletter at Outrasfontes.com

If you have any critique or suggestion, please fell confortable to contact us at any time.

Ricardo Esteves Gomes  
 [http://www.outrasfontes.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015145505/http:/www.outrasfontes.com/ "http://www.outrasfontes.com")
